title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - EMERGENCY PODCAST: Fury KOs Wilder in an instant classic
itunes:title: Boxing with Chris Mannix - EMERGENCY PODCAST: Fury KOs Wilder in an instant classic
description:
Chris sits down with DAZN broadcaster and former boxer Sergio Mora for an emergency reaction podcast. They break down Tyson Fury's win over Deontay Wilder and discuss what is next for both fighters.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
